description:
Provide detailed PC specs information and real-time hardware temperature monitoring

IObit SysInfo is a free system information tool that provides detailed PC specs and real-time hardware monitoring. It offers an easy-to-navigate interface to view every piece of hardware connected to your computer. With real-time monitoring, you can track the temperature and usage rates of your CPU, GPU, disk, motherboard, and memory. The software also includes temperature alerts to prevent overheating and potential damage. Additionally, you can export system information reports in TXT and HTML formats for easy sharing.
